name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a skilled Chain Protocol Engineer with expertise in Go and Rust, I focus on developing and optimizing blockchain technology and protocol infrastructure. My hands-on experience with EVM, WASM, and Cosmos SDK, alongside deep understanding of Substrate modules, JSON-RPC, and gRPC, allows me to build robust and efficient blockchain solutions. I bring a strong background in validator and sequencer operations, coupled with a keen understanding of zero-knowledge integration techniques, including PLONK and Groth16, ensuring security and reliability in all developments. With over 8 years in software engineering, I have a solid grasp of CI/CD practices, extensive testing methodologies, and thorough documentation strategies, complemented by valuable contributions to open-source projects. I also possess knowledge of cross-chain technologies, including light clients, optimistic bridges, validity bridges, and IBC/XCM, enabling innovative and adaptable protocol designs.
